title: mahiSAsuramadani
sahitya:
mahiSAsuramadani jagadambA varamaruL


anupallavi

  sakala ulaguyirinum niraindirukkum shakti svarUpiNi shyAmaLAngi jaya jaya


caraNam    kalaimagaL tirumagaL malaimagaL vaDivAi karuNaiyuDan aDi paNiyum bhaktargaLin kali thIrkkak-koluvirukkum yOga mAyE rAjarAjEshvari ambikE
